verbs.description: [ARG0: Donald Trump] [V: lied] [ARGM-TMP: yet again] [ARGM-TMP: on Wednesday] [ARGM-TMP: during a briefing to FEMA where he claimed that the United States is exporting energy for the first time ever] .
